body_html: The GPU:0 actually refers to different GPU with different index in CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=${index}. I don't think there is a bug; you will not be able to start more than one process on the same GPU given your current configuration.
body_text: The GPU:0 actually refers to different GPU with different index in CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=${index}. I don't think there is a bug; you will not be able to start more than one process on the same GPU given your current configuration.
body: The `GPU:0` actually refers to different GPU with different index in `CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=${index}`. I don't think there is a bug; you will not be able to start more than one process on the same GPU given your current configuration.
